trans-unit.resname: CMR·1 | The Prismatic Piper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Prismatic Piper
trans-unit.target: 虹彩魔笛手

trans-unit.resname: CMR·1 | The Prismatic Piper | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME is your commander, choose a color before the game begins. CARDNAME is the chosen color.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME是你的指挥官，则在游戏开始前选择一种颜色。CARDNAME是该色。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·1 | The Prismatic Piper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is everything and nothing.
trans-unit.target: 万物皆是，万物皆非。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·2 | Akroma, Vision of Ixidor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Akroma, Vision of Ixidor
trans-unit.target: 意悉多幻象爱若玛

trans-unit.resname: CMR·2 | Akroma, Vision of Ixidor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample\nAt the beginning of each combat, until end of turn, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 if it has flying, +1/+1 if it has first strike, and so on for double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, vigilance, and partner.\nPartner
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻，警戒，践踏 在每次战斗开始时，对每个由你操控的其他生物而言，它每具有飞行、先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏、警戒与拍档等十二种异能中的一种，便得+1/+1直到回合结束。 拍档

trans-unit.resname: CMR·3 | Akroma's Will | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Akroma's Will
trans-unit.target: 爱若玛的意志

trans-unit.resname: CMR·3 | Akroma's Will | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.\n• Creatures you control gain flying, vigilance, and double strike until end of turn.\n• Creatures you control gain lifelink, indestructible, and protection from all colors until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项。如果你于施放此咒语时操控指挥官，则你可以两项都选。 •由你操控的生物获得飞行、警戒与连击异能直到回合结束。 •由你操控的生物获得系命、不灭与反五色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·4 | Alharu, Solemn Ritualist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.\nWhenever a nontoken creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在至多两个其他目标生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每当一个由你操控、其上有+1/+1指示物且非衍生物的生物死去时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.target: 立誓哨卫利维沃

trans-unit.resname: CMR·31 | Livio, Oathsworn Sentinel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}: Choose another target creature. Its controller may exile it with an aegis counter on it.\n{2}{W}, {T}: Return all exiled cards with aegis counters on them to the battlefield under their owners' control.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: {1}{W}：选择另一个目标生物。其操控者可以将它放逐，且上面有一个庇护指示物。 {2}{W}，{T}：将所有被放逐且其上有庇护指示物的牌在各自拥有者的操控下移回战场。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·32 | Make a Stand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Make a Stand
trans-unit.target: 奋勇抗敌

trans-unit.resname: CMR·32 | Make a Stand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的生物得+1/+0且获得不灭异能。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它们消灭。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·32 | Make a Stand | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For a moment they stood tall, all fear forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 他们在那一刻忘却所有恐惧，奋勇抗敌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·33 | Ninth Bridge Patrol | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ninth Bridge Patrol
trans-unit.target: 九桥巡卫

trans-unit.resname: CMR·33 | Ninth Bridge Patrol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物离开战场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·33 | Ninth Bridge Patrol | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Consulate keeps watch at each of the eleven bridges to ensure that the market remains a haven for commerce, not for con artists.
trans-unit.target: 执政院严密监控十一座桥，确保市场的公平交易，防止奸商横行。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·34 | Open the Armory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Open the Armory
trans-unit.target: 打开兵械库

trans-unit.resname: CMR·34 | Open the Armory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an Aura or Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张灵气或武具牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·34 | Open the Armory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Once Avacyn returned, I hoped I'd never need these things again. I didn't think I'd be dusting them off to use against angels."
trans-unit.target: 「艾维欣重临后，我曾希望永远不会再用到这些武器。我从未想过我会要擦亮它们来对付天使。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·35 | Orzhov Advokist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orzhov Advokist
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫倡议人

trans-unit.resname: CMR·35 | Orzhov Advokist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or a planeswalker you control until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位牌手各可以在一个由其操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。若有牌手如此作，则直到你的下一个回合，由该牌手操控的生物不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·35 | Orzhov Advokist | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫并不在乎你是否悔过，只在乎你是否赔过。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·36 | Palace Sentinels | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 宫殿哨卫

trans-unit.resname: CMR·36 | Palace Sentinels | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection."\n—Adriana, Captain of the Guard
trans-unit.target: 「深得民心的统治者根本不需要此等保护。」 ～侍卫队长亚卓安娜

trans-unit.source: "Bant's most gallant knights wear my sigil, and for that I am humbled."

trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，将它放逐。 在每个结束步骤开始时，若你未操控生物，则牺牲CARDNAME，并将所有以它放逐的牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·61 | Flood of Recollection | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flood of Recollection
trans-unit.target: 回忆满盈

trans-unit.resname: CMR·61 | Flood of Recollection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 将目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·61 | Flood of Recollection | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.
trans-unit.target: 杰斯翻落瀑布，一头扎进过往回忆当中。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·62 | Confiscate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Confiscate
trans-unit.target: 没收

trans-unit.resname: CMR·62 | Confiscate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant permanent\nYou control enchanted permanent.
trans-unit.target: 结附于永久物 你操控所结附的永久物。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·62 | Confiscate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't understand why he works so hard on a device to duplicate a sound so easily made with hand and armpit."\n—Barrin, progress report
trans-unit.target: 「我不了解，为何他这么努力造出一部机器，只为了要发出用手臂或腋窝就能发出的声音。」 ～巴林，进度报告

trans-unit.resname: CMR·63 | Court of Cunning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Court of Cunning
trans-unit.target: 黠智宫廷

trans-unit.resname: CMR·63 | Court of Cunning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, any number of target players each mill two cards. If you're the monarch, each of those players mills ten cards instead. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，任意数量的目标牌手各磨两张牌。若你是君主，则改为这些牌手各磨十张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是牌手将其牌库顶的牌置入其坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·63 | Court of Cunning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A throne built on wisdom cannot be toppled.
trans-unit.target: 知识为上，平安永续。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·64 | Daring Saboteur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Daring Saboteur
trans-unit.target: 大胆破坏者

trans-unit.resname: CMR·64 | Daring Saboteur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: CARDNAME can't be blocked this turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}：CARDNAME本回合不能被阻挡。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·64 | Daring Saboteur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They'll never see me coming."
trans-unit.target: 「他们绝想不到我会出现。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·65 | Deranged Assistant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deranged Assistant
trans-unit.target: 狂乱助手

trans-unit.resname: CMR·65 | Deranged Assistant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，磨一张牌：加{C}。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·65 | Deranged Assistant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."
trans-unit.target: 「嘎耳，把泥浆机调一下。嘎耳，再搬几具尸体来。嘎耳，别哭了，把你的脑组织给我。如果他一直这么粗鲁，我就不干了。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eligeth, Crossroads Augur
trans-unit.target: 歧路卜算师艾力思

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nIf you would scry a number of cards, draw that many cards instead.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 如果你将占卜若干牌，则改为抓等量的牌。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·66 | Eligeth, Crossroads Augur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There's no better place to divine the future than at a nexus of branching presents."
trans-unit.target: 「身处现时分支的交汇点，正是占卜未来的绝佳场所。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·67 | Esior, Wardwing Familiar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Esior, Wardwing Familiar
trans-unit.target: 翼护佣兽艾希俄

trans-unit.resname: CMR·67 | Esior, Wardwing Familiar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nSpells your opponents cast that target one or more commanders you control cost {3} more to cast.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 对手施放且以由你操控之一个或数个指挥官为目标的咒语增加{3}来施放。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·68 | Fall from Favor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fall from Favor
trans-unit.target: 失宠

trans-unit.resname: CMR·68 | Fall from Favor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature and you become the monarch.\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step unless that player is the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置所结附的生物，且你成为君主。 除非所结附之生物的操控者是君主，否则它于该牌手的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·69 | Forceful Denial | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Forceful Denial
trans-unit.target: 聚力拒斥

trans-unit.resname: CMR·69 | Forceful Denial | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)\nCounter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。） 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·70 | Galestrike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galestrike
trans-unit.target: 啸风击

trans-unit.resname: CMR·70 | Galestrike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将目标已横置的生物移回其拥有者手上。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·70 | Galestrike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Strong wings make strong winds.
trans-unit.target: 劲翅鼓烈风。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·71 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghost of Ramirez DePietro
trans-unit.target: 拉米雷迪皮托的鬼魂

trans-unit.resname: CMR·71 | Ghost of Ramirez DePietro | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by creatures with toughness 3 or greater.\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, choose up to one target card in a graveyard that was discarded or put there from a library this turn. Put that card into its owner's hand.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被防御力等于或大于3的生物阻挡。 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，选择至多一张目标在坟墓场中的牌，且须为本回合中弃掉或从牌库进入该处者。将该牌置于其拥有者手上。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·72 | Glacian, Powerstone Engineer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glacian, Powerstone Engineer
trans-unit.target: 魔力石技师格雷贤

trans-unit.resname: CMR·72 | Glacian, Powerstone Engineer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，横置X个由你操控且未横置的神器：检视你牌库顶的X张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·72 | Glacian, Powerstone Engineer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "His energy is as boundless as the powerstones'."\n—Rebbec, architect of ascension
trans-unit.target: 「他的能量永无穷尽，就如同魔力石一般。」 ～扬升构念师莉蓓可

trans-unit.resname: CMR·73 | Horizon Scholar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Horizon Scholar
trans-unit.target: 天际学者

trans-unit.resname: CMR·73 | Horizon Scholar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·74 | Hullbreacher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hullbreacher
trans-unit.target: 破船勇盗

trans-unit.resname: CMR·74 | Hullbreacher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nIf an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 闪现 如果某对手将抓一张牌，且这不是其于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌，则改为你派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·74 | Hullbreacher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I don't need a map to find riches."
trans-unit.target: 「我不用地图也能找到财宝。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·75 | Interpret the Signs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Interpret the Signs
trans-unit.target: 解读预兆

trans-unit.resname: CMR·75 | Interpret the Signs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Draw cards equal to that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 占卜3，然后展示你的牌库顶牌。抓若干牌，其数量等同于该牌的总法术力费用。（占卜3的流程是检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·76 | Kitesail Corsair | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kitesail Corsair
trans-unit.target: 航筝海盗

trans-unit.resname: CMR·76 | Kitesail Corsair | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has flying as long as it's attacking.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME正进行攻击，它便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·76 | Kitesail Corsair | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"
trans-unit.target: 「既然能够展翅高飞，望远又何必拘泥于登高二字？」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·77 | Kitesail Skirmisher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kitesail Skirmisher
trans-unit.target: 航筝侦卫

trans-unit.resname: CMR·77 | Kitesail Skirmisher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, another target creature attacking the same player or planeswalker gains flying until end of turn.\nEncore {4}{U} ({4}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，另一个目标向相同牌手或鹏洛客进行攻击的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 返场{4}{U}（{4}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：为每位对手各进行以下流程～派出一个衍生复制品，且其本回合若能攻击该对手，便须如此作。它们获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它们牺牲。起动的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·78 | Laboratory Drudge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Laboratory Drudge
trans-unit.target: 实验室苦力妖

trans-unit.resname: CMR·78 | Laboratory Drudge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card if you've cast a spell from a graveyard or activated an ability of a card in a graveyard this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，如果你本回合中曾从坟墓场中施放咒语或起动坟墓场中牌的异能，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·78 | Laboratory Drudge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Many hands make light work."\n—Ludevic, necro-alchemist
trans-unit.target: 「手多了，干活就省力。」 ～死灵炼金术士卢德维

trans-unit.resname: CMR·79 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator
trans-unit.target: 锐目领航员马科姆

trans-unit.resname: CMR·79 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当由你操控的一个或数个海盗向对手造成伤害时，每有一位受到伤害的对手，你便派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。） 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·80 | Mana Drain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mana Drain
trans-unit.target: 汲取魔力

trans-unit.resname: CMR·80 | Mana Drain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。在你的下一个行动阶段开始时，加若干{C}，其数量等同于该咒语的总法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·80 | Mana Drain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Enthusiasm is no match for preparation.
trans-unit.target: 万丈激情难敌万全之策。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·81 | Merchant Raiders | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Merchant Raiders
trans-unit.target: 商船袭劫盗

trans-unit.resname: CMR·81 | Merchant Raiders | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, tap up to one target creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个海盗在你的操控下进战场时，横置至多一个目标生物。于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，该生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·81 | Merchant Raiders | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tell you what, you keep the rope."
trans-unit.target: 「跟你说，绳子留给你。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·82 | Mnemonic Deluge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mnemonic Deluge
trans-unit.target: 回忆奔腾

trans-unit.resname: CMR·82 | Mnemonic Deluge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Copy that card three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 将目标瞬间或法术牌从坟墓场放逐。复制该牌三次。你可以施放这些复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·82 | Mnemonic Deluge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Past, present, and future surged through the wizard's mind, bringing a flood of possibilities.
trans-unit.target: 过去、现在和未来在法师脑海中翻腾涌动，引出凶猛愿景浪潮。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·83 | Omenspeaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Omenspeaker
trans-unit.target: 示兆先知

trans-unit.resname: CMR·83 | Omenspeaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·83 | Omenspeaker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.
trans-unit.target: 当她说出那些预言时连自己也大吃一惊。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·84 | Preordain | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Preordain
trans-unit.target: 注定

trans-unit.resname: CMR·84 | Preordain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。（占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·85 | Prosperous Pirates | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prosperous Pirates
trans-unit.target: 丰获海盗

trans-unit.resname: CMR·85 | Prosperous Pirates | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出两个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·85 | Prosperous Pirates | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.
trans-unit.target: 虽然已竭尽所能，但海盗们还是没办法用黄金将水上之都绝涛城沉入海底。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·86 | Prying Eyes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prying Eyes
trans-unit.target: 眼线窥视

trans-unit.resname: CMR·86 | Prying Eyes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓四张牌，然后弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·86 | Prying Eyes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Citizen! Your crime has been recorded. Cease movement and await arrest, or further penalties will be immediately imposed."
trans-unit.target: 「市民！你的罪行已被记录。请立刻停止手中行动，静待被捕，否则将绝不宽贷。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·87 | Run Away Together | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Run Away Together
trans-unit.target: 携手奔逃

trans-unit.resname: CMR·87 | Run Away Together | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Return those creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 选择两个目标由不同牌手操控的生物。将这些生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·87 | Run Away Together | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Virtue is virtue, whatever the heart that nurtures it."\n—Malacan, Vantress exile
trans-unit.target: 「无论是由何种心灵所激发，美德仍然还是美德。」 ～凡翠丝流犯马拉坎

trans-unit.resname: CMR·88 | Sailor of Means | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sailor of Means
trans-unit.target: 通天水手

trans-unit.resname: CMR·88 | Sailor of Means | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·88 | Sailor of Means | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.
trans-unit.target: 所谓水涨船高，欧拉兹卡日益凶猛的掠夺浪潮，也使得各路舰船情绪不断高涨。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·89 | Sakashima of a Thousand Faces | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sakashima of a Thousand Faces
trans-unit.target: 千面客逆岛

trans-unit.resname: CMR·89 | Sakashima of a Thousand Faces | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of another creature you control, except it has CARDNAME's other abilities.\nThe "legend rule" doesn't apply to permanents you control.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成另一个由你操控之生物的复制品来进入战场，但它具有CARDNAME的其他异能。 「传奇规则」不对由你操控的永久物生效。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·90 | Sakashima's Protege | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sakashima's Protege
trans-unit.target: 逆岛的门徒

trans-unit.resname: CMR·90 | Sakashima's Protege | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nCascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)\nYou may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any permanent that entered the battlefield this turn.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。） 你可以使CARDNAME当成本回合进战场之任一永久物的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·91 | Sakashima's Will | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sakashima's Will
trans-unit.target: 逆岛的意志

trans-unit.resname: CMR·91 | Sakashima's Will | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.\n• Target opponent chooses a creature they control. You gain control of it.\n• Choose a creature you control. Each other creature you control becomes a copy of that creature until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项。如果你于施放此咒语时操控指挥官，则你可以两项都选。 •目标对手选择一个由其操控的生物。你获得该生物的操控权。 •选择一个由你操控的生物。每个由你操控的其他生物均成为该生物的复制品直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·92 | Scholar of Stars | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scholar of Stars
trans-unit.target: 星相学者

trans-unit.resname: CMR·92 | Scholar of Stars | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你操控神器，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·92 | Scholar of Stars | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The path of the stars is as reliable as the instruments that measure them."
trans-unit.target: 「星辰的行迹稳定不变，如同量测它们的工具。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·93 | Scholar of the Ages | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scholar of the Ages
trans-unit.target: 岁月学者

trans-unit.resname: CMR·93 | Scholar of the Ages | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将至多两张目标瞬间和／或法术牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·93 | Scholar of the Ages | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I study the past to find hope for the future."
trans-unit.target: 「我究研过去，是为了替将来寻找希望。」

trans-unit.target: 只要防御牌手操控神器，CARDNAME便不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·94 | Scrapdiver Serpent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.
trans-unit.target: 聪明的神器师会自行清理干净。

trans-unit.target: 飞行 {U}，牺牲CARDNAME：反击目标咒语或异能，且其须以你或由你操控的生物为目标。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·96 | Siren Stormtamer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He's the calm that hides the coming storm.
trans-unit.target: 他便是能躲避来袭暴风的无风之处。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·97 | Skaab Goliath | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Three heads are better than one.

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，于CARDNAME仍在战场上的时段内，目标由你操控的神器成为基础力量与防御力为5/5的神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your postcombat main phase, you get an additional beginning phase after this phase. (The beginning phase includes the untap, upkeep, and draw steps.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你战斗后的行动阶段开始时，你在该阶段后额外得到一个开始阶段。（开始阶段包括重置步骤、维持步骤和抓牌步骤。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·99 | Sphinx of the Second Sun | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He watches in silence as the shadows shift, bringing Amonkhet ever nearer to the Hour of Revelation.
trans-unit.target: 阿芒凯大地阴影变换，将此处愈加带近预示时刻；他全都看在眼中，却不发一言。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·101 | Strategic Planning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「波拉斯按照自己的想象重塑了这个时空。他在这里占有优势。我们必须谨慎行事。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.resname: CMR·103 | Thirst for Knowledge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To truly know something, you must become it. The trick is to not lose yourself in the process."
trans-unit.target: 「你必须先自己成为某事物，才能够真正了解它。关键之处在于，这过程中千万不要迷失自我。」

They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，抓一张牌。 返场{5}{U}{U}（{5}{U}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：为每位对手各进行以下流程～派出一个衍生复制品，且其本回合若能攻击该对手，便须如此作。它们获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它们牺牲。起动的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·104 | Trove Tracker | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, target creature defending player controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control plus the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.\nPartner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以弃一张牌。当你如此作时，目标由防御牌手操控的生物得-X/-X直到回合结束，X为由你操控的神器数量与你坟墓场中的神器牌数量之总和。 拍档（你可将两个具有拍档异能的生物共同用作指挥官。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·109 | Bitter Revelation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here you lie then, Ugin. The corpses of worlds will join you in the tomb."\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: 「乌金，原来你沉眠于此。众世界的残骸也将到墓中与你相聚。」 ～索霖马可夫

trans-unit.resname: CMR·113 | Corpse Churn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The distraction of your life has ended. Now your service begins."\n—Kalitas, thrall of Ulamog
trans-unit.target: 「你生命已逝，便再无需分神。从现在开始好好为我卖命。」 ～钨拉莫鬼卒卡力塔

trans-unit.target: 野心宫廷

trans-unit.resname: CMR·114 | Court of Ambition | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card. If you're the monarch, instead each opponent loses 6 life unless they discard two cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 在你的维持开始时，对每位对手而言，除非他弃一张牌，否则失去3点生命。若你是君主，则改为对每位对手而言，除非他弃两张牌，否则失去6点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·114 | Court of Ambition | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: All things are connected: light to dark, age to youth, blood to blood.
trans-unit.target: 万物皆相连：光明对黑暗，年长对年轻，鲜血对鲜血。

trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物：在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."

trans-unit.resname: CMR·118 | Demonic Lore | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: CMR·120 | Elvish Doomsayer | Flavor Text

They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。 每当任一对手于你是君主时攻击你，CARDNAME对该牌手造成等同于其手牌数量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·175 | Emberwilde Captain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You are bold, challenger, but flammable."
trans-unit.target: 「天不怕地不怕？我来教你怕火。」

trans-unit.resname: CMR·176 | Explosion of Riches | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Explosion of Riches
trans-unit.target: 财宝爆破

trans-unit.resname: CMR·176 | Explosion of Riches | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card, then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way, CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌，然后每位其他牌手各可以抓一张牌。每当有牌手以此法抓一张牌时，从所有对手中随机选择目标对手，CARDNAME对该牌手造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·176 | Explosion of Riches | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You've got how much gold there?"
trans-unit.target: 「你那边有多少金子？」

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it deals damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking equal to the number of artifacts you control.\nEncore {5}{R} ({5}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，它对所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的神器数量。 返场{5}{R}（{5}{R}，从你的坟墓场放逐此牌：为每位对手各进行以下流程～派出一个衍生复制品，且其本回合若能攻击该对手，便须如此作。它们获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它们牺牲。起动的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each non-Pirate creature.

trans-unit.resname: CMR·178 | Fiery Cannonade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wary of the ferocious dinosaurs, the Legion of Dusk built up the walls of their fort—just in time for the pirates to burn them down.
trans-unit.target: 暮影军团为了抵御恐龙侵袭，架高了要塞的壁垒～但完工时正好赶上海盗炮火，全部付诸一炬。

trans-unit.source: Flamekin Herald
trans-unit.target: 炎身传令使

trans-unit.resname: CMR·179 | Flamekin Herald | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Commander spells you cast have cascade. (Whenever you cast a commander, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with lesser converted mana cost. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 你施放的指挥官咒语具有倾曳异能。（每当你施放指挥官时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张总法术力费用比其低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a loyalty counter on it for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.
0: Choose target creature. Until your next turn, if that creature would deal combat damage to one of your opponents, it deals triple that damage to that player instead.
−X: CARDNAME deals X damage to each of up to three targets.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
Partner

trans-unit.source: You and permanents you control have protection from Salamanders.\nAt the beginning of your end step, each player who controls the fewest creatures creates a 4/3 blue Salamander Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 你和由你操控的永久物具有反火蜥蜴保护异能。 在你的结束步骤开始时，每位操控生物数量为所有牌手中最少者的牌手各派出一个4/3蓝色火蜥蜴／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 「清算的日子即将来临。我们对埃分族的了解可能是唯一的救命稻草。」

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking defending player or a planeswalker they control. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. When you put a creature card onto the battlefield this way, it fights CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，展示你的牌库顶牌。若它是生物牌，则将之横置放进战场，且正向防御牌手或任一由其操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。若否，则将该牌置于你手上。当你以此法将生物牌放进战场时，它与CARDNAME互斗。

Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)\nSpells you cast with converted mana cost 6 or greater have cascade.
